column4: hi! could someone help me please, with an install of ATI drivers
i'm trying to install the drivers ./ati-driver-installer-8.20.8-i386.run: line 273: cd: fglrx-install: No such file or directory
, right after I selected the package it gives me an error "no such file"
do you have a reason to use the 8.20.8, or would the version in ubuntu do?
